weakness: PRIV-001 - User added to Administrators group
risk_statement: Unapproved elevation to administrative privileges can enable lateral movement and system compromise, violating least privilege expectations.
recommended_actions: Confirm the group membership change is authorized and documented. | Identify the actor who made the change and the originating system. | Review recent activity for the newly-privileged account (logons, processes). | Verify least privilege and remove membership if not required.
